course_title: Special Topics in Economics: Pol.Econ.of M.East & N.Africa
course_description: Selected topics in Economics. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON _OX 100 or ECON 101 or ECON_OX 101 or FIN 201 AND ECON 112  or ECON_OX112 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
